script:
;;-----------------------------------------
;;1月中旬ユニットマイペ
;;-----------------------------------------
# script "lisp"
# background "underground_world"
# bgmfile "bgm315" "BgmLostRagnarokBattle005" 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# body 3200511
# pos 3200511 3
# scale 3200511 0.8 0
# alpha 3200511 0 0
# mask 3200511 off
# brightness 3200511 0 0
# body 3600811
# pos 3600811 3
# scale 3600811 0.8 0
# alpha 3600811 0 0
# mask 3600811 off
# brightness 3600811 0 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "white" 0.1
# imageset 0 "kiri_02"
# imagelayer 0 3
# imagealpha 0 0 0
# imageset 1 "kiri_02"
# imagelayer 1 3
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imageset 2 "kiri_02"
# imagelayer 2 3
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imageset 3 "kiri_02"
# imagelayer 3 3
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imageset 4 "bg_white"
# imagelayer 4 5
# imagealpha 4 1 0
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# se "SE_9022"
# imagealpha 0 1 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagealpha 3 1 0
# imagepos 0 130 -100
# imagepos 1 130 100
# imagepos 2 -170 0
# imagepos 3 -170 200
# imagepos 4 0 0
# fadein "white" 0.1
# waitandnext 0.1

# imagemoveto 0 400 0 2
# imagemoveto 1 400 0 2
# imagemoveto 2 -400 0 2
# imagemoveto 3 -400 0 2
# imagescale 0 3 2
# imagescale 1 3 2
# imagescale 2 3 2
# imagescale 3 3 2
# imagealpha 0 0 2
# imagealpha 1 0 2
# imagealpha 2 0 2
# imagealpha 3 0 2
# imagealpha 4 0 2
# waitandnext 2

# alpha 3200511 1 0.7
# waitandnext 1.7

# alpha 3200511 0 0.7
# alpha 3600811 1 0.7
# waitandnext 1.7

# fadeout "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# background "angel_world"
# alpha 3600811 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# se "SE_1028"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# alpha 3200511 1 0.5
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
@
誇り高き理想の宣布者
清き祈りの奏ー

# se "SE_0506"
# brightness 3200511 1.0 0.7
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
@
ミトゥム・[00BFFF]聖鎖[-]・サンダルフォン

# fadein "white" 0.3
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
# voice 320051 "mitwumu_t_kyara_0018"
# face 3200511 "happy"
@ミトゥム
わたしがマスターを、
しっかり導いてあげますからね！

# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# background "devil_world"
# alpha 3200511 0 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# se "SE_1028"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# alpha 3600811 1 0.5
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
@
儚き亡者を救いし
ネクロマンサー

# se "SE_0506"
# brightness 3600811 1 0.7
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
@
グリダヴォル・
[FF0000]D. plug[-]・ムルムル

# fadein "white" 0.3
# voice 360081 "guridavoru_a_kyara_0017"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
@グリダヴォル
何ていうか…
君のことは守りたくなるんだよね

# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 0.8
# waitandnext 0.8

# move 3600811 2 0
# mask 3600811 on
# alpha 3200511 1 0
# move 3200511 4 0
# mask 3200511 on
# waitandnext 0.5

# fadein "black" 0.8
# waitandnext 0.8

# se "SE_0003"
# textsize 24
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
@
新ユニットは
[FFA500]7STEP[-]ガチャでピックアップ！

# textsize 24
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
@
1日1回限定
[FF0000]無料[-]ガチャでも登場！
